title: Nicefoto Bi-Color LED Light Wand HL-288 5500K/3200K Ice Light with Battery for Video Photography
features: 4 stops brightness adjustment, according to the actual needs of free choice, increase or decrease operation is convenient.
Intelligent Memory: Boot automatically reply to the last shutdown before the setting, eliminating the time to repeat the operation, reduce the workload.
High color rendering: CRI≥95, High quality LED lamp beads for perfect restoration of the subject's true color.
Dual color temperature design: 5500K/3200K, Rotating color film can choose color temperature freely, easy to switch easily and quickly.
Replaceable battery: detachable battery replacement, replaceable battery design, multiple batteries, no need to worry about battery life.
description: Features:3200K/5500K double color temperature, rotate to adjust color temperature. CRI is 90+. Brightness is adjustable. Max. brightness is 2000 lumens. Continuous light, fast multi-flash and slow multi-flash 3-in-1 functions.
